contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=170 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 170-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= | length_km = 207.0 | length_round = 1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 74-75, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_a= {{jct|state=QC|QC|169}} in [[Métabetchouan–Lac-à-la-Croix, Quebec|Métabetchouan–Lac-à-la-Croix]] |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|138}} in [[Saint-Siméon, Capitale-Nationale, Quebec|Saint-Siméon]] |previous_type= |previous_route= |next_type= |next_route= |cities=[[Saguenay, Quebec|Saguenay]], [[Alma, Quebec|Alma]], [[Saint-Gédéon, Quebec|Saint-Gédéon]], [[Saint-Siméon, Capitale-Nationale, Quebec|Saint-Siméon]] | previous_type = QC | previous_route =169 | next_type = QC | next_route =171 |junction= {{jct|state=QC|QC|169}} in Saint-Bruno <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|70|QC|372}} in Jonquière <br> {{jct|state=QC|A|70|QC|175}} in Chicoutimi <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|372|QC|381}} in La Baie }} '''Route 170''' is a major east/west highway on the north shore of the [[St. Lawrence River]] in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]], and it parallels the [[Saguenay River]] on the south side of it. The western terminus of Route 170 is in [[Métabetchouan–Lac-à-la-Croix]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 169|Route 169]], at [[Lac Saint-Jean]], and the eastern terminus is in [[Saint-Siméon, Capitale-Nationale, Quebec|Saint-Siméon]], at the junction of [[Quebec Route 138|Route 138]], close to the Saint Lawrence River. It is a busy highway in the [[Saguenay–Lac-Saint-Jean]] part as it links the former cities of La Baie, Chicoutimi and Jonquière (now all part of Saguenay) together, and it provides the main link between the Lac-Saint-Jean and Saguenay areas. The stretch of road between La Baie and Saint-Siméon is a very scenic ride in the mountains, and providing access to roads leading to the [[Saguenay Fjord]]. ==Municipalities along Route 170== * [[Métabetchouan–Lac-à-la-Croix, Quebec|Métabetchouan–Lac-à-la-Croix]] * [[Saint-Gédéon, Quebec|Saint-Gédéon]] * [[Saint-Bruno, Quebec|Saint-Bruno]] * [[Larouche, Quebec|Larouche]] * '''[[Saguenay, Quebec|Saguenay]]''' - (''[[Jonquière]] / [[Chicoutimi]] / [[La Baie, Quebec|La Baie]]'') * [[Saint-Félix-d'Otis, Quebec|Saint-Felix-d'Otis]] * [[Rivière-Éternité, Quebec|Rivière-Éternité]] * [[L'Anse-Saint-Jean, Quebec|L'Anse-Saint-Jean]] * [[Petit-Saguenay, Quebec|Petit-Saguenay]] * [[Saint-Siméon, Capitale-Nationale, Quebec|Saint-Siméon]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Provincial Route Map (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} <br> {{Quebec Routes (100-199)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|170]] [[Category:Roads in Saguenay–Lac-Saint-Jean]] [[Category:Transport in Saguenay, Quebec]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
